title: imac A1312 2009 27inch, core2duo backlight goes away
message:
serial number  W894716C5PM


I did not open this imac yet, the issue is the backlight, randomly goes away, then i press the power button to put into sleep, then press it again to wake it and the backlight comes back. When its off, like after 10-60 minutes, with a flashlight i can see the picture and mouse moving.
The backlight always comes back with this sleep-wake method, or by unplugging the power cable and start it again. Same if i boot from ext. hdd.

Fixed only few imacs before, what is the more likely to be faulty? screen? board backlight IC? 

I dont have another imac screen to test with.

title: imac A1312 2009 27inch, core2duo backlight goes away
message: Bad soldering on the LED strips in the LCD. Need to totally pull apart the LCD, take out the 2 LED strips and reflow each LED and the connectors.

title: imac A1312 2009 27inch, core2duo backlight goes away
message: Just to add, this is a real mission separating the display first time. can be done, but high chance it goes wrong first time.

title: imac A1312 2009 27inch, core2duo backlight goes away
message:
its actually very simple, remove the tape and any screws out of the way. then use a Metal Spudger to pry the frame out.

title: imac A1312 2009 27inch, core2duo backlight goes away
message:
I'm sure there are a few videos on youtube as these LCDs also have the common clouding issues by dust getting in the backlight diffuser. It is 100% the LCD and very very common on all 27" LCDs.
The easy way out here is to get a bad/cracked LCD and just swap over your good "glas" part.
